Thursday, September 1, 2005

How to integrate FCKEditor and Rails

Posted by admin

The DHTML-based WYSIWYG-editors are getting better and better. In the lead pack in the FCKEditor and Joshua M. Charles has just written a brief article on how easy it is to integrate it with Rails.
